entries.title: Bees like to roll little wooden balls as a form of play, study finds
entries.description: It's “a strong indication that insect minds are far more sophisticated than we might imagine."

entries.title: Handbrake video transcoder adds official AV1 codec support in latest release
entries.description: Nvidia and AMD's AV1 encoders aren't yet supported, but it probably won't be long.

entries.title: New York governor signs modified right-to-repair bill at the last minute
entries.description: Bill passed the state legislature with overwhelming majorities over the summer.

entries.title: Suit accusing YouTube of tracking children is back on after appeal
entries.description: DreamWorks, Cartoon Network, and others accused of illegally luring kids to YouTube.

entries.title: CRISPR’s quest to slay Donegal Amy
entries.description: Trial hints at treating, or even curing, a rare fatal disease

entries.title: Don’t call it a refresh: The 6 most adventurous laptop designs of 2022
entries.description: Love it or hate it these PCs took risks, from new RAM shapes to big, bendy OLED.

entries.title: Here are the 10 best new cars, trucks, and SUVs we drove in 2022
entries.description: Eight EVs made the top 10 this year.

entries.title: Ars Technica’s best video games of 2022
entries.description: A dearth of big-budget blockbusters couldn't hold back the year in games.
